overview:
Innovative and highly skilled autodidact based on 12 years of entrepreneurship, proven knowledge in leading teams, founding companies and product development; highly experienced professional in different computing fields as eCommerce, content management, data transforming, system architect and builder of various business models. I make systems and business models useable and powerful by connecting social media layer and artificial intelligence.

I can explain complex things in a way that non techies can understand it. I Have the ability to remember everything and have nearly complete overview about all good and strong web technologies.
